Name: Saint George
Description: The capital region, which includes the capital city Roseau. Known for its vibrant markets, historical sites, and coastal beauty.

Name: Saint Andrew
Description: Located in the northeastern part of the island, known for its natural beauty, including waterfalls and lush rainforests.

Name: Saint David
Description: A coastal region known for its beautiful beaches, including the famous Batibou Beach.

Name: Saint John
Description: A region known for its farming community and stunning rural landscapes.

Name: Saint Joseph
Description: This region is home to many historical sites and is known for the dense forests and hiking trails.

Name: Saint Luke
Description: A small region famous for its wildlife and agricultural activities.

Name: Saint Mark
Description: A coastal region known for its peaceful environment and picturesque beaches.

Name: Saint Patrick
Description: This region is known for its mountains and rivers and is a popular spot for hiking and exploring nature.
